name: basic-enhanced
description: username/password authentication, password complies to these rules: a)_Length >= 6 characters, b) contains characters from three of the following four categories: - English uppercase characters (A through Z), - English lowercase characters (a through z) - Base 10 digits (0 through 9) - Non-alphabetic characters (for example, !, $, #, %)

name: fixed-X-API-key
description: The delivering party must generate a x-api-key and hand it over to the requesting party

name: limited-X-API-key
description: The delivering party must expose a webservice to request a valid x-api-key. This key must expire frequently.

name: PKI
description: The delivering party must generate a certificate and hand over the public key to the requesting party

name: whitelisting
description: The delivering party must whitelist the requesting party's server based on IP
